text:
XMLCipher.getInstance().loadEncryptedKey(encryptedKeyElt) doesn't set the 
correct CarriedKeyName element.

Should be 
  result.setCarriedName(carriedNameElement.getFirstChild().getNodeValue()) 
instead of 
  result.setCarriedName(carriedNameElement.getNodeValue()) 
into XMLCipher class (line 2421)
creator: yvan.hess@imtf.ch
raul-info@r-bg.com
text:
Thanks for detecting the bug, Fixed in SVN head.
Two things, can you send as a test case that exercies this code path?.
And the last one, is only me, but near 4000 line class seems very big...
